Election NLP
Election 2024Then and NowFeedback

About

This project and page is a resource for text data and analyses related to U.S. elections. The initial version (Oct 2024) focuses on the 2024 U.S. Presidential Election.

Data Sources

  • Candidate and Party Platforms
  • Speech Transcripts
  • Debate Transcripts [next cycle]
  • Social media [next cycle]
  • News articles [next cycle]

Methods

  • Word-level statistics (PMI, log-odds)
  • Lexicon-based sentiment and emotion analysis
  • LLM-based comparative summaries

Subscribe

  • Julia Mendelsohn and Julia Margie
  • juliame@uchicago.edu

Automated analyses of election-related documents, including party platforms, candidate agendas, and campaign speeches. Future versions will include social media and news articles.
